content: Yes, the fashion and hairstyles on Soul Train were certainly iconic and ahead of their time. The show was not just about highlighting music and dance, but also about showcasing style and culture. The show's hosts and guests often sported flashy outfits, big hairdos, and bold accessories, which became widely popular and influential in the African American community during the '70s and '80s. Soul Train has undoubtedly played a significant role in shaping the fashion and style trends of that era.
